body_html:
Yes; that's fine. But I think you may have to ask us to trigger it.

On Fri, Oct 27, 2017 at 4:12 PM, Charles Shenton ***@***.***> wrote: Thanks for the review. I've made those changes you requested. As an aside, I'm having some issues running unit tests locally. Docker container builds fine, collects the tests, then skips them all. Is it alright if I rely on the CI servers to do the heavy lifting? — You are receiving this because your review was requested. body:
Yes; that's fine.  But I think you may have to ask us to trigger it.

On Fri, Oct 27, 2017 at 4:12 PM, Charles Shenton <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Thanks for the review. I've made those changes you requested. As an aside,
> I'm having some issues running unit tests locally. Docker container builds
> fine, collects the tests, then skips them all. Is it alright if I rely on
> the CI servers to do the heavy lifting?
>
> —
